title: 3 and Out - Vikings/Steelers TNF Reaction, McCarthy Guarantee Game, Belichick 2nd Act, Harbaugh to Raiders (?),Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Vikings/Steelers TNF Reaction, McCarthy Guarantee Game, Belichick 2nd Act, Harbaugh to Raiders (?),Headlines, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Vikings fighting off a late comeback by the Steelers to get a TNF win, and why it won't save Mike Zimmer's job. Then, he looks at Mike McCarthy oddly guaranteeing a win over the WFT, why it makes zero sense, why Belichick's MNF bulldozing of the Bills is among his best, why Jim Harbaugh to the Raiders would make a ton of sense, if the Browns need to move off Baker should they lose to the Ravens, and why Michigan's Aiden Hutchinson gaining the inside edge over Oregon's Kayvon Thibodeaux to be the first overall pick. He also gives some quick thoughts on some other top headlines, including why the Jamal Adams trade has been a disaster for Pete Carroll, and his thoughts on the wave of high profile CFB hires and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure to follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
